articles.title: 5 times Jacqueline Fernandez proved that she is Instagrammer of the Year!
articles.description: The Kick actress is contending for the title of Instagrammer of the Year in our ongoing BollywoodLife Film Awards.

articles.title: Khatron Ke Khiladi 6 contestant Iqbal Khan wants to work with Sriram Raghavan, not Rohit Shetty!
articles.description: The popular action reality show came to an end tonight Colors’ popular action reality show, Khatron Ke Khiladi 6, has finally come to an end and we miss it already.

articles.title: MasterChef India 4 grand finale: Nikita Gandhi beats Neha Shah and Bhakti Arora to become the winner!
articles.description: After enough song, dance, glitz and drama, it was the student from Abu Dhabi who had the last laugh The fourth season of cooking reality show, MasterChef India 4 finally ended on a high note after the viewers chose Nikita Gandhi to be the desrving winner of the show.

articles.description: This could be your last chance to vote for Priyanka Chopra as the Mallika-e-Social media… Priyanka Chopra is one of the toughest contenders for the Mallika-e-Social Media title in our ongoing BollywoodLife awards.

articles.title: Farhan Akthar crosses 5 million followers on Twitter!
articles.description: The Dil Dhadakne Do star, who reached the milestone today, thanked his fans for love and support Farahan Akthar is a man with many hats.
